content: This is a **list of [football clubs](/wiki/Football_club_(association_football)) in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore)**. ## Singapore Premier League Clubs - [Albirex Niigata (S)](/wiki/Albirex_Niigata_(S)) - [Balestier Khalsa](/wiki/Balestier_Khalsa_FC) - [Geylang International](/wiki/Geylang_International_FC) - [Hougang United](/wiki/Hougang_United_FC) - [Lion City Sailors](/wiki/Lion_City_Sailors_FC) - [BG Tampines Rovers](/wiki/Tampines_Rovers_FC) - [Tanjong Pagar United](/wiki/Tanjong_Pagar_United_FC) - [Young Lions](/wiki/Young_Lions_FC) (Developmental team) ## [Singapore Football League Clubs](/wiki/Singapore_National_Football_League) The **Singapore Football League**, commonly known as the **SFL**, is an FAS sanctioned football competition for clubs that are affiliated to the [Football Association of Singapore](/wiki/Football_Association_of_Singapore). It makes up the second and third tier of football in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) after the [SPL](/wiki/Singapore_Premier_League) and before the Singapore Island Wide League. ## Active SFL Teams - Admiralty CSN - Tengah FC - GFA Sporting Westlake - Bishan Barx FC - GDT Circuit FC - Westwood EJC FC - Jungfrau Punggol FC - [Kaki Bukit SC](/wiki/Kaki_Bukit_SC) - Katong FC - Police SA - Project Vault Oxley SC - [Singapore Cricket Club](/wiki/Singapore_Cricket_Club) - [Singapore Khalsa Association](/wiki/Singapore_Khalsa_Association_FC) - South Avenue SC - Starlight Soccerites FC - Tiong Bahru FC - Warwick Knights FC - [Yishun Sentek Mariners FC](/wiki/Yishun_Sentek_Mariners_FC) ## [Singapore Island Wide League Clubs](/wiki/Football_Association_of_Singapore) The Island Wide League is an amateur tournament which made up the 4th tier of the Singapore football league system. It is a SFL qualification tournament whereby the top 2 team of the tournament get an automatic qualification into SFL the following season. ## Active IWL Clubs - Admiralty City - Ayer Rajah Gryphons - Bedok South Avenue - Bukit Timah FC - [Commonwealth Cosmos FC](/wiki/Commonwealth_Cosmos_FC) - East Dragon FC - [Eastern Thunder](/wiki/Admiralty_Rangers_FC) - Geylang Serai FC - [Gymkhana FC](/wiki/Gymkhana_FC) - Mattar Sailors - Pasirian Lions - Sembawang City FC - Simei United FC - [Singapore Xin Hua](/wiki/Singapore_Xin_Hua_Sports_Club) - Tanah Merah United - Tessensohn Khalsa Rovers - Verde Cresta Combined SC - Winchester Isla FC - [Woodlands Lions FC](/wiki/Woodlands_Lions) - Woodlands Rangers - [Yishun FC](/wiki/Yishun_FC) ## Cosmoleague & EFL Clubs - 1 Tanah Merah Barbarians FC - Belgian and Luxembourg Association of Singapore - British Club Lions FC - British Exiles FC - Casuals FC Singapore - CBD Wanderers FC - Exiles FC - FC Mogura - FC Myk - FC Nippon - Fighting Cocks FC - Gaelic Lions FC - Gaulois Sports Club - German-Swiss All Stars FC - Hibernians FC - Hilderinc FC - Hollandse FC https://www.hollandsefc.com/ - Hotspurs FC - International Lions FC - J-Heat - Mariners FC Singapore - Olympique Gaulois - Purple Monkeys FC - [Singapore Cricket Club](/wiki/Singapore_Cricket_Club) (EFL) - [Singapore FC](/wiki/Singapore_FC) - Singapore Vikings FC - Tuan Gemuk Athletics - Westland FC ## Futsal Clubs ### Brunei Elite Futsal League - Kampung Buangkok Futsal Club ### Kyna Futsal League - Jurong United Futsal Club - Lakeside Futsal Club - Serangoon Coolies Futsal Team - Woodlands Lions Futsal Club ## [Five-a-side](/wiki/Five-a-side_football), Six-a-side, [Seven-a-side](/wiki/Seven-a-side_football), Eight-a-side football - Atlético de Madrid Singapore lions - Azzurri FC - Arsenal SG - Boozebonitoz FC - CP FOOTBALL - Knockout FC - Falah FC - FC CERTIS RANGERS - Federal C.F. - Fifty34 United Football Club - Kachang Puteh - Kampung Buangkok FC - Lightning Tigers FC - Opera United - SEFC - Happy Family Futsal Team - Republic Sports Association Futsal - Joga bonito - KAKIBALLERZ - La Plata Juniors FC - Mandai FC - MUS Devils FC - Raving Falcons FC - Singapore Disability Sports Council - Russla's Hustlers - Sunrise FC - Gaelic Lions Balotelitubbies - Torpedo Rovers - Hibernians Futsal Club - Ronaldinho 10 FT - Paris-Saint Germain Singapore Fan Club - Olympique de Marseille Fan Club - Manchester City FC Supporters Club Singapore - SG Santos Futebol - Sengkang District 19 FC - Serangoon United FC - Team Revolution Futsal - Teck Whye Hounds FC - Northern United FC ## Former clubs ### Former Singapore Premier League clubs - [DPMM FC](/wiki/DPMM_FC) (move to [Malaysia Super League](/wiki/Malaysia_Super_League)) ### Former S.League clubs - Balestier Central (Merged with Clementi Khalsa to form [Balestier Khalsa](/wiki/Balestier_Khalsa)) - Clementi Khalsa (Merged with Balestier Central to form [Balestier Khalsa](/wiki/Balestier_Khalsa)) - [Gombak United](/wiki/Gombak_United) (Withdrew due to financial reason) - [Jurong FC](/wiki/Jurong_FC) (Withdrew due to financial reason) - Paya Lebar Punggol (Merged with Sengkang Marine to form Sengkang Punggol) - [Sembawang Rangers](/wiki/Sembawang_Rangers) (Withdrew due to financial reason) - Sengkang Marine (Merged with Paya Lebar Punggol to form Sengkang Punggol) - Sengkang Punggol (Now [Hougang United](/wiki/Hougang_United)) - [Woodlands Wellington](/wiki/Woodlands_Wellington) (merged with [Hougang United](/wiki/Hougang_United)) - [Beijing Guoan Talent](/wiki/Beijing_Guoan_Talent_Singapore_FC) (Chinese satellite club) - [Dalian Shide](/wiki/Dalian_Shide_Siwu_FC) (Chinese satellite club) - [Liaoning Guangyuan](/wiki/Liaoning_Guangyuan) (Chinese satellite club) - [Sinchi FC](/wiki/Sinchi_FC) (Chinese disapora club) - [Harimau Muda A](/wiki/Harimau_Muda_A) (Malaysian national team U22) - [Harimau Muda B](/wiki/Harimau_Muda_B) (Malaysian national team U21) - [Super Reds](/wiki/Super_Reds) (Korean diaspora club) - [Sporting Afrique](/wiki/Sporting_Afrique_FC) (Foreign team made up of players from [Africa](/wiki/Africa)) ### [FAS Premier League](/wiki/FAS_Premier_League) (1988–1995) - [Balestier United RC](/wiki/Balestier_United_RC) - [Darwin Cubs](/wiki/Darwin_Cubs) (foreign team from [Australia](/wiki/Australia)) - [Geylang International FC](/wiki/Geylang_International_FC) - [Jurong Town FC](/wiki/Jurong_Town_FC) - [Perth Kangaroos IFC](/wiki/Perth_Kangaroos_IFC) (foreign team from [Australia](/wiki/Australia)) - [Police Sports Association](/wiki/Home_United_FC) (now [Home United](/wiki/Home_United), while current PSA plays in NFL Division 1) - [Singapore Armed Forces Sports Association](/wiki/Singapore_Armed_Forces_Football_Club) (now [Warriors FC](/wiki/Warriors_FC), while current SAFSA plays in NFL Division 1) - [Singapore National Team](/wiki/Singapore_national_football_team) (played in the Premier League for one year in 1995, following [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore_Lions)'s withdrawal from the [Malaysia League](/wiki/Malaysia_Super_League)) - [Tampines Rovers FC](/wiki/Tampines_Rovers_FC) - [Tiong Bahru CSC](/wiki/Tiong_Bahru_CSC) ### Former SFL/IWL Clubs - Ang Mo Kio United FC - Boon Keng SRC - Changi Village SRC - Elias Park FC - Gambas Avenue FC - GFA Sporting Westlake FC - GFA Victoria FC - Kallang Sportif Huskies FC - Kembangan United FC - Mountbatten FC - Newton Heath FC - Prison SRC - Redhill Rangers FC - Singapore Recreation Club - [Siglap FC](/wiki/Siglap_FC) - [Football Association of Singapore](/wiki/Football_Association_of_Singapore) - [S.League](/wiki/Singapore_Premier_League) - [Singapore Cup](/wiki/Singapore_Cup) - [Singapore Community Shield](/wiki/Singapore_Community_Shield) - [Singapore National Football League](/wiki/Singapore_National_Football_League) - [Singapore League Cup](/wiki/Singapore_League_Cup) - [Singapore FA Cup](/wiki/Singapore_FA_Cup) http://www.cosmoleague.com/league https://equatorialfootballleague.leaguerepublic.com/index.html
title: List of football clubs in Singapore
